Test Case Change Classification.Acceptance Criteria - Modified Content: Validate repository visibility settings (Public/Private) are applied correctly during creation and reflect the selected option post-creation.

Old Test Case Steps: 5. Select 'Public' as the visibility. [Test Data- Public] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
8. Verify that the new repository is created and the repository page is displayed. [Test Data- ] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]
New Modified Test Case Steps: 5. Select 'Public' or 'Private' as the visibility. [Test Data- Public/Private] [Acceptance Criteria- AC-2]. Verify that the selected visibility is correctly applied during repository creation.
8. Verify that the new repository is created, the repository page is displayed, and the repository's visibility setting matches the selected option (Public/Private).
New Modified Expected Results: 5. Visibility is set to Public/Private as selected and reflected correctly.
8. Repository page for 'new-repo' is displayed with correct visibility (Public/Private).
Test Case Impact Details.What changed in Test Cases Steps & Expec: Steps updated to explicitly verify that the selected visibility (Public/Private) is correctly applied during repository creation and reflected post-creation.
